fields.name: BfdEnabled
fields.description: The indicator of BFD enablement for this BgpPeer.

fields.name: BgpMultiHop
fields.description: The indicator to enable multi-hop peering support.

fields.name: HoldTime
fields.description: The requested BGP hold time value. This field uses ISO 8601 duration format, for example P1H.

fields.name: KeepAliveTime
fields.description: The requested BGP keepalive time value. This field uses ISO 8601 duration format, for example P1H.

fields.name: MyAsn
fields.description: The autonomous system number used for the local end of the BGP session.

fields.name: Name
fields.description: The name used to identify this BGP peer for association with a BGP advertisement.

fields.name: Password
fields.description: The authentication password for routers enforcing TCP MD5 authenticated sessions.

fields.name: PeerAddress
fields.description: The IPv4 or IPv6 address used to connect this BGP session.

fields.name: PeerAsn
fields.description: The autonomous system number expected from the remote end of the BGP session.

fields.name: PeerPort
fields.description: The port used to connect this BGP session.
